notes.title: Database Integration
notes.text: Integrate the application with the MySQL database.

notes.title: User Registration
notes.text:
Implement user registration functionality with email verification.

Description: Develop a user registration system that allows new users to create an account on the platform. The registration process should include email verification to ensure the authenticity of user accounts.
Acceptance Criteria: Users should be able to enter their email address, choose a secure password, and receive a verification email. Upon clicking the verification link, their account should be marked as verified in the system

notes.title: Release v1.0
notes.text: Prepare and deploy the first stable release of the software.

notes.title: Performance Optimization
notes.text: Optimize the application's performance by implementing caching mechanisms.

notes.title: Design Wireframes
notes.text: Create wireframes for the new dashboard layout.

notes.title: Refactor Login Process
notes.text: Improve the code structure and optimize the login process.

notes.title: Homepage Redesign
notes.text: Redesign the homepage layout to improve user experience.

notes.text: Implement user registration functionality with email verification.
